tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am absolutely thrilled to share my glowing experience with Dr. Nirmala at Motherhood Hospitals. From the moment I stepped into her office, I knew I was in excellent hands. Dr. Nirmala's compassionate and empathetic approach to patient care truly sets her apart in the field of OB-GYN.

Unlike some practitioners who prioritize profit over patient well-being, Dr. Nirmala's integrity and dedication to her patients are evident in every interaction. She took the time to listen to my concerns with genuine interest and concern, creating a safe and supportive environment where I felt comfortable discussing even the most sensitive topics.

What truly impressed me about Dr. Nirmala was her commitment to evidence-based medicine. ****** **** ************ *********** ***** ** *********** she took a thoughtful approach, always putting my health and well-being first. Her thorough explanations and patient education were invaluable, empowering me to make informed decisions about my care.

Beyond her clinical expertise, Dr. Nirmala's warmth and kindness truly stood out. She approached each appointment with a genuine smile and a reassuring demeanor, making me feel valued and respected as a patient. Her humility and willingness to collaborate with me on my healthcare journey were truly refreshing and greatly appreciated.

I recommend Dr. Nirmala at Motherhood Hospitals very highly. Her compassionate care, commitment to evidence-based practice, and genuine concern for her patients' well-being make her an exceptional OBGYN. If you're searching for a healthcare provider who truly cares about you as an individual, look no further than Dr. Nirmala.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Caesarean Section (C Section),Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,
review: Hi, I have consulted her from the day 1 to delivery of my pregnancy. I must say she is the best doctor I have ever seen in Bangalore. She handles all cases very nicely and explained so well about any risk involved. Our experience with her was excellent. I would definitely recommend her and just trust her in her every advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have visited Dr Nirmala mam for many times. First of all she is good in experience and skill. These are the points which I liked in her.

1) she will listen to you and understand the problem 

2) She is very friendly and explain all your doubts without hesitation. 

3) Treat the problem in a step by step manner and will not rush for the tests simply. Based on the requirement/ situation only will suggest to go for the tests. 

I highly recommend the Doctor *** *** *** **** *** ** *** **** ****** ** **** *******

Met Dr. Nirmala mam at Aaxis hospital as soon as we planned to conceive and continued her consultation until delivery.  
She is very friendly, explains everything in detail and clarified all our doubts and queries. She is one who is always supportive and reachable at any time on phone and helped for my baby delivery during Covid pendemic.

I recommend this doctor. She listens patiently and explains well. She handled my emergency delivery situation very smoothly. We are so glad to have her during my journey of pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am truly grateful for the exceptional care provided by my doctor during pregnancy.  Her expertise, compassion and dedication made the entire journey feel not just medically sound but also emotionally  supported. I feel fortunate to have had such a skilled and caring professional guiding me through this important phase of my life.Thank you for your unwavering commitment to maternal well being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My name is Gayathri,  we have very good experience with doctor. Doctor is very friendly and  will listen problems patiently then explain the issue clearly. Madam always give pasitive thoughts. She don't suggest many medicines instead of that she suggests home remedy tips. Friends I would suggest you will feel happy once you visit Doctor.  Thanks ..

Very understanding doctor. She has great patience for her patients and is extremely supportive. She is always approachable and always provides crystal clear clarifications promptly, for any doubts/questions (medical related queries) that could become a source of worry. I am very thankful to her and definitely would recommend her to any of my friends or relatives.

*** ** *** **** ****** *** ************ Very friendly and helping nature. Helped for arranging the hospital for my baby delivery in emergency also supported over phone during Covid pendemic after delivery. Recommended for best treatment.üëçüëçüëç

She is a doctor with positive and motivative attitude. She listens patiently and explain well.  Never saw her being panic even incase of complexity. She knows well and having great experience and knowledge. I'm She managed my case well and happy with her care and guidance.

Hi , I feel that Dr.Nirmala mam is a very good doctor and well experienced , who helped me to cure PCOD with the help of proper medicines , treatment and suggestions . Iam so glad to say that she is my favourite doctor . And I will definitely recommend people to this clinic...
